name: Kenney Microgames
description:
I realized I had some sudden spare time right when GDevelop Weekend Jam 1 started.  With the theme of Warioware/Microgames, I thought it'd be fun to see what I could make. I also wanted to showcase as much of Kenney.nl's awesome assets that has helped the indie dev community so much over the years.

 This was made in ~10 hours over the course of the weekend, and most of that was minor tweaking to get the game feel where I wanted it. 

I made this exclusively with image and sound effect assets from Kenney.nl, and music from "Of Different Nature" (https://fardifferent.bandcamp.com)

Also available at https://liluo.io/silver-streak/kenney-microgames
